text: Gene Gutowski, born as Witold Bardach, (July 26, 1925 in Lwów, Poland, now Ukraine – May 10, 2016 Warsaw(AP Gutowski obituary)) was a Polish-born American movie producer. He produced many of Roman Polanski's movies.Od Holocastu do Hollywood, Gazeta Wyborcza (2004) He was known for producing The Pianist, The Fearless Vampire Killers, Cul-de-sac.Spieprzaj do Hollywood! Gazeta Wyborcza (2009) Gutowski died of pneumonia in Warsaw, Poland on May 10, 2016, aged 90.Polanski producer and Holocaust survivor Gene Gutowski dies ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Poland Category:Polish movie producers
title: Gene Gutowski
